President Higgins demands international community work to improve Gaza aid situation
news.summary: "Join with Ireland and others in seeking an immediate delivery of aid," the President told the international community.

news.title: Release date announced for Jim Sheridan's Re-Creation film inspired by Sophie Toscan Du Plantier case
news.summary: "It is vital to not be afraid to look at the truth, to value the living and the dead,” said the film's director Jim Sheridan.

news.title: July A&R Department: Florence Road, Ahmed, With Love, Makeshift Art Bar & more
news.summary: From dirty-as-fuck guitar rock to hip hop beats of the sunkissed variety, July is another cracking month for new Irish music.

news.title: Pete Davidson annnounces comedy shows in Dublin and Belfast
news.summary: The funny man has just recently made his way back into the limelight after taking a break from stand-up performances last year

news.title: Ash announce new album Ad Astra
news.summary: The record comes out on October 3 via Fierce Panda.

news.title: Lankum’s Ian Lynch: "Frank Harte was a massive influence on us when we first started becoming interested in traditional singing"
news.summary: As part of a special Frank Harte anniversary feature – available to read in full in the current issue of Hot Press – Lankum's Ian Lynch reflects on the influence of the Chapelizod-born singer and song collector.
